DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness two application scheme cryosurgery 5 week course topical imiquimod i.e . cryosurgery end second week imiquimod follow 3 week imiquimod ( immunocryosurgery ) versus cryosurgery day 0 follow 5 week topical imiquimod ( cryoimmunotherapy )
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Schemes Cryosurgery Imiquimod Combination Treatment Basal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison efficacy - Number patient : N=40 - Arms : Two equal arm ( 20 patient ) - Inclusion criterion : Basal cell carcinoma skin proven biopsy - Exclusion criterion : ( 1 ) Size tumor > 5cm ; ( 2 ) Distance eyelid < 0,5cm ; ( 3 ) Number tumor > 5 - Interim analysis : When least 10 patient include arm end first year study The patient randomize 2 group Group 1 ( Immunocryosurgery ) Group 2 ( Cryoimmunotherapy ) Treatment protocol : Group 1 ( Immunocryosurgery ) : Patients apply imiquimod daily 14 day tumor rim 2mm around tumor . On day 14 session mild cryosurgery ( 2 cycle 15 second , open spray liquid nitrogen ) apply patient continue application imiquimod another 3 week evaluate . Group 2 ( Cryoimmunotherapy ) : Patients submit cryosurgery ( 2 cycle 15 second , open spray liquid nitrogen ) subsequently apply imiquimod tumor rim 2mm around tumor 5 week total . They evaluate week 2 5 . Patients group evaluate 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month termination imiquimod treatment . In case clinical relapse , confirm biopsy patient treat immunocrysurgery .
